question: Does the subscription auto-renew?
answer: Yes, the subscription is automatically renewed every month or year, depending on the billing you have chosen, and it is charged from the credit card saved on your account.

question: Can I cancel at any time?
answer: Yes, you may cancel the subscription from your account settings. The subscription will remain valid until the last date of your billing cycle, but will not renew.

question: Can I change to another subscription plan if my icon needs change?
answer: Yes, you can do that yourself from your account settings. Changing to a larger plan becomes effective immediately, whereas moving to a smaller plan takes effect the day the subscription renews.

question: Will I lose the downloads that I didn't use during the month?
answer: No. Your unused downloads will roll over to the next month, so you can use them later. You can accumulate downloads for up to 6 months.

question: Can I pause my subscription if I don't need icons for some time?
answer: Yes, you can pause your subscription for 1 month and up to 6 months. During the pause period, you cannot make downloads and will not be billed.

question: What license covers the icons?
answer: All premium icons are covered by the Basic License, which allows commercial use without attribution.
